accessibility.title: Accessibility First
accessibility.description: My Audio Text was born with a purpose: to make audio messages accessible to everyone. If you're deaf, hard of hearing, or simply prefer reading over listening, our solution was made with you in mind. We believe communication should be inclusive, fast, and barrier-free.

q1.question: Is the transcription really accurate?
q1.answer: Yes! Our AI is trained to understand different accents, noisy environments, and even low-quality audio. In most cases, we're more accurate than WhatsApp's native transcription.

q2.question: Does it work with very long audios?
q2.answer: Yes! There's no time limit. For very long audios, we also provide an automatic summary for easy reading.

q3.question: Can I cancel anytime?
q3.answer: Yes! No contracts or penalties. You can cancel whenever you want, directly through WhatsApp.

q4.question: When is Instagram and Telegram coming?
q4.answer: We're working on it! Integration with Instagram Direct and Telegram is planned for the coming months. Current subscribers will get automatic access.

q5.question: How does the free trial work?
q5.answer: You have 15 full days to test all features. We don't ask for a credit card upfront. If you like it, activate the subscription at the end of the period.

q6.question: Is it safe?
q6.answer: Absolutely! Your audios are processed securely and no content is stored after transcription. Your privacy is our priority.

footer.tagline: Transforming audio into text. Simple as that.
